about_the_game:
In this game, you can use the foreign vocabulary you have mastered (and soon will master) to strengthen your three characters. By dragging word cards, you can build an indestructible combination of the warrior, the mage and the priest. In the world of monsters, dragons, and magic, resist the incoming powerful enemies and survive tenaciously.

Facing increasingly powerful enemies

In the game you will face waves of enemies, from goblins and orcs to devils and dragons, and the enemies will become more powerful as time goes by. Can you use the power of words and logical construction to survive the waves that seem to be engulfing you?

Build your lineup

Fighting alongside you are three reliable companions - the warrior, the mage and the priest. You can let them each play their own traditional roles, just like we have seen in many games, or you can use your wild ideas to make your three partners unique.

Improve your foreign language skills unconsciously

The battles in the game are all automatic, and you only need to drag the vocabulary cards to strengthen your three partners, and then enjoy their heroic postures in defeating powerful enemies. You can choose vocabulary books in different languages ​​and levels. You may be surprised: learning a foreign language is so enjoyable that you almost can’t stop.
